item.title: Open Control Center on Mac With a Keyboard Shortcut
item.description: Looking to boost your Mac’s functionality with a quick shortcut? I’ve got you covered! Learn how to open Control Center in macOS effortlessly by using Fn + C. It’s a time-saving trick that grants you instant access to key settings and features. Here’s how: Locate the ‘Fn’ Key: Find the ‘Fn’ key on your Mac’s keyboard. It’s usually in the lower-left corner. Press ‘Fn + C’: With your ‘Fn’ key identified, simply press it simultaneously with the ‘C’ key.
